jobDescription: Job Description Job Description SummaryExciting Summer Internship Opportunity!Participate in development of an algorithm to predict longevity of cryopumps based on actual customer process data. Support activities may include assembly of test equipment, lab experiments to validate theory, and literature searches on any related IP. The work will be both investigative and hands-on in the laboratory and requires working with others both internal and external to Brooks. Type of Degree (In Progress)/Skills/Unique Capabilities: Candidate must be pursuing a BS in Mathematics, Mechanical or Chemical engineering, have basic materials science knowledge (material structures, mechanics, processing). Experience with Solidworks or CAD modeling is desirable but not required.
